programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: It might be cold and windy, but if you have trust in your guide the result could be an epic day of fishing! Rush steps up to the challenge and puts Ali on an incredible bite of mutton snapper while also checking another species off of Ali's bucket list!

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: As season 8 comes to a close, Ali and Rush reflect on some of the more memorable moments on the water. From the Florida Keys to San Diego, Guatemala, and the Bahamas, the show has taken us on quite the adventures with more to come!

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Capt. Jared Raskob joins legendary Captains Donny Lange and Charlie Scoble offshore in Islamorada.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: There is a place in Florida that not many people have heard about. The Forgotten Coast, Ever heard of it? Didn’t think so. Let’s discover it together.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Join us at Pelican’s Roost in Delacroix, LA, where Captain Sean Thornton and Chef Jay Ducote were able to share the full Louisiana Catch & Cook experience with Texas Food Personality Trey “Chow Down” Chapman—with delicious results.

programme.title: Global Getaway
programme.desc: This week on Getaway Nicky Buckley winds up our Christmas Markets cruise in Europe, enjoying all the festive favorites through Germany and into Amsterdam.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Noah Rucks teams up with his cousin for a classic Wisconsin duck hunt filled with early morning anticipation, working decoys, and fast-flying action.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: Ride along with Wisconsin DNR Game Warden Jonathan Kaiser as he patrols the frozen waters of Lake Winnebago during the opening days of the state’s historic sturgeon spearing season.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: In this milestone episode of Modern Hunter, Tinsae Rucks takes a major step forward in his hunting journey.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier joins Capt. Brian Sawyer on an exhilarating pursuit of Silver Kings prowling the waters of Homosassa.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier teams up with Capt. David Paycheck for a day of firsts. Jason tries a new style of bass fishing with David, and then introduces David to hunting Moorhen for the first time.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: In this episode, Jason Dozier teams up with his longtime friend, Capt. Danny, for an exciting fishing adventure in Tampa Bay. Reuniting on the water for the first time in over a decade, they're looking forward to making memories, enjoying the day, and maybe even reeling in a fresh catch for dinner.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.sub-title: "Islamorada Blackfins And Mahis With Capt Scott Stoky"
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve start the season with Capt. Scott Stoky chasing Islamorada Tunas and Mahis offshore out of Plantation Boat Mart.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve catch a mixed bag bottom fishing off of Islamorada with Captain Scott Stoky.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve go yellow tailing out of Hawks Cay for a limit of tasty yellowtail snapper and Steve picks a battle with a big lemon shark.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve bounce around the reefs out of Hawks Cay catching a wide variety of reef dwellers.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve take their brand new Invincible 36’ out of Plantation Boat Mart to fly the kites for some early season sailfishing.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott and Steve make a big run from Plantation Boat Mart in the Invincible 36’ into the green Gulf waters to fill the Yeti cooler and battle with some seas monsters.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Meet Danny Pruitt as he shows off his home town. Fishing for pan fish and showing off what Dawsonville, GA has to offer.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Great views, Food and people. Danny learns to fly fish on the iconic Madison River in Ennis, Montana.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: The Montana adventure continues on private lakes targeting trophy trout. This is where fish stories are born.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny meets up with Jeff Coffee of ZOE angling group to talk shop, tie flies and fish in one of the most biodiverse lakes in the country.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "In Memory of Shannon | Phillip Culpepper is Back | "
programme.desc: After taking a break from hunting for personal reasons, Phillip Culpepper gets back in the turkey woods. They spend some time in Wyoming, and then hunt in Montana, too.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "Tyler Farr Tags One Right Off the Roost | Gobbler Leaves Hens | "
programme.desc: The guys meet up with Tyler Farr and Nate Hosie. Then, they call in a longbeard right off the roost. Later that day, Phillip Culpepper and Drake Lamb head to a brand new farm they just got permission to hunt, and right before fly-up, Drake Lamb cuts down a gobbler that comes a long way.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "Two First Osceolas for the Boys | South Florida At Its Finest | "
programme.desc: The Spring Thunder crew heads southward to Florida for round No 2. They're meeting up with good friends Chris Seaton and Chris Quarrels. Plus, Michael Pitts from Hunt Club and Drake Lamb both take their first ever Osceolas.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "Tagging a Spooked Gobby | Right Over the Shoulder | "
programme.desc: Phillip Culpepper and Drake Lamb head to Mississippi to hunt with good friend, Perry Ross. Jarrod Nichols from Bushnell and Jesse Highling from Retay are in camp. Nichols has one heck of a hunt that ends with a longbeard gobbling at 20 yards. It's go time.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "The Merriam's Made Us Work For It | Montana Strutter Madness | "
programme.desc: Phillip Culpepper and Drake Lamb make one last stop with some good friends at J&J Guide Service before leaving Montana. Rich turns the guys loose and they almost get it done on the first evening. The next morning, the birds make the guys work for them, and finally, Culpepper is able to seal the deal on a henned-up longbeard.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: "3 MOUNTAIN GOBBLERS DOWN!! | Best Merriam's footage ever??? | "
programme.desc: Hunting with longtime friends Jeff and Deb Smith at 7J Outfitters in Sundance Wyoming. The Spring Thunder Crew split-up and take down 3 fired-up longbeards!!

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: With a free day before Icast. Trenton and Ryan go offshore to try and fill the cooler. Catching a variety of species and hoping to get their hands on a hogfish.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew is chasing Tarpon in Tampa Florida with Ryan Harrington. After a few close calls and grinding out the long days, they finally catch up to the Silver King.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA takes his Son Cam to the Sports Coast for some friendly Father Son competition.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: How do you catch a persnickety Redfish? One bite at a time.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: C.A. heads to Apalachicola for a mixed bag of redfish and fresh oyster.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: CA heads to Marco Island to flip Mangroves for Snook.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Danny joins his good buddy Trey Mikell in his truly wild backyard along the Nature Coast. The two of them are searching for big redfish in inches of water.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is with his good friend Frank Gidus. The two are speaking at the “Local Waters” social this evening, so why not fish before the event in Frank’s local waters…

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Every spring brings a new opportunity to take a step forward & recall the memories of seasons past. World War II Veteran and retired Judge Arden Hill has spent most of his life chasing turkeys in the hills of Tennessee. Now in his 90’s, Arden doesn’t let age stand in the way of his love for spring turkey hunting. Also: patterning turkey shotguns and hunting spring gobblers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Winchester introduces the Shoot United brand aimed at offering useful information and tips to the millions of new shooters entering the shooting sports. New York native and Midland University competitive shotgun shooter Amy Cawley and her journey as a student-athlete is followed. Also: Theo Ribbs gives shooting tips for competition and Foster Bartholow reviews Winchester AA Diamond Grade.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Charles Rodney’s relationship with his hunting dogs, passion for field-to-table living and connection to the land make his love for chasing rabbits contagious while the heritage of Winchester’s small game ammunition makes this beloved pastime accessible for generations to come. Also: a Model 42 collection for the ages and hunting Kansas coyotes with the Keefer Brothers.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Deer season — the sights, the sounds and the smells stick with you. It’s about remembering those who came before us and setting the right example for those who look up to us. It’s about protecting the tradition, so they always have something to look forward to. When communities come together, we see the real reason for this special time of year.
Brady Snyder hunts down a giant Iowa buck on public land.

programme.title: Global Getaway
programme.sub-title: Getaway - "Scenic Rivers Gems of the Seine 2"
programme.desc: This week on Getaway David Reyne is in France, cruising the Seine River, visiting the somber sites of the D-Day Landings plus the spectacular gardens that inspired Monet.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Rusty Creasey joins the Spring Thunder crew for an incredible turkey hunt in Oklahoma. The guys are blessed to fill 6 tags in a short time and have several memorable hunts.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Today, Capt. Danny is with his good friend Frank Gidus. The two are speaking at the “Local Waters” social this evening, so why not fish before the event in Frank’s local waters…

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger take Plantation Boat Mart’s new 36’ Invincible out to the swordfish grounds.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.sub-title: "Palm Beach in the new Invincible Catamaran"
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger break in their new Invincible Catamaran with a trip to fish out of Palm Beach with their friend Captain Dave Fields.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger fly kites with Captain Dave Fields for a great day of sailfishing out of Sailfish Marina in Palm Beach.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger take a long run out into the Gulf from Key West to sample the bottom fishing and the long range capability of their new Invincible Catamaran.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger continue fishing after taking a long run out into the Gulf from Key West to sample the bottom fishing and the long range capability of their new Invincible Catamaran.
